Figure 6.4
Partial View of L Tier Stairway, from the SHU Camera at 10th Floor-South Entrance
Source: DOJ OIG and the BOP

text_blocks.content: Partial View of L Tier Stairway, from the SHU Camera at 10th Floor-South Entrance

additional_notes: The document appears to be a page from a report or inspection document related to a correctional facility, given the context of 'L Tier Stairway' and 'SHU Camera'. The image is of a stairway captured by a surveillance camera. The overall quality of the document is clear and legible.
